title: Best Odds To Reach The Finals
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to break down which teams have the best betting odds to win the Eastern and Western Conferences including why the Nets are being wildly overvalued. Plus, MacMahon hands out his monthly major award.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Which Teams Have The Best Odds To Win Their Conference?
